mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id AS commentId, c.schedule_id AS scheduleId, c.writer_id AS writerId, u.user_name AS writerName, c.content AS content, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM schedule_comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE c.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} ORDER BY c.comment_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule_comment (schedule_id, writer_id, content) VALUES (#{scheduleId}, #{writerId}, #{content})
